quest.name: Hungry Hog
journal: Shinden's friend may have bitten off more than he can chew.

dialogue.name: SHINDEN
dialogue.text: There's a warthog trying to eat my entire harvest! One of my friends went off to fight it, but he is no warrior.

dialogue.name: SHINDEN
dialogue.text: If you are willing to help, please head for my paddies before the situation worsens.

dialogue.name: SHINDEN
dialogue.text: Please head for my paddies before the situation worsens.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERT02731
dialogue.text: I-I did not expect it to be quite so big...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERT02731
dialogue.text: Thank you for your help, kind stranger. It does not bear thinking what would have happened had you not come.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERT02731
dialogue.text: I grabbed a blade and rushed to Shinden's paddies as soon as I heard that the hog had appeared. However, my courage deserted me when I needed it most.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERT02731
dialogue.text: You, on the other hand, are clearly a fine warrior. My thanks for coming when you did.

dialogue.name: SHINDEN
dialogue.text: Thank you for helping. My friend told me everything.

dialogue.name: SHINDEN
dialogue.text: We are truly at nature's mercy these days. Anyone capable of fighting in our village has long since been conscripted into the imperial army. Who knows where they are currently being forced to do battle.

dialogue.name: SHINDEN
dialogue.text: I do hope the day comes when they are able to return to Namai... Ah, but this is no story to be telling a complete stranger. Allow me to thank you once again. You have done me a great service.
